document.full_text: sudan's foreign minister ali karti said on monday the army would stay in abyei, a disputed region in the north-south division of the country next month, until it was stable enough to leave.
document.title: troops to stay in abyei for now: sudan minister
lines_and_colors: sudan's foreign minister ali karti said on monday the army would stay in abyei, a disputed region in the north-south division of the country next month, until it was stable enough to leave.
